website_summaries.verdict: TDK's WR700 is a solid wireless headphone option, with big bass and a high quality wireless streaming courtesy of Kleer. It isn't flawless, but it's a bargain for its $250 price.
pros: Powerful audio performance with deep bass response at moderate volumes
Easy pairing, high-quality wireless audio via Kleer technology
cons: Distorts on deep bass tracks at maximum volume
Requires four AAA batteries for operation

customer_reviews.title: Great for moving about the house while listening to music ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for moving about the house while listening to music or podcast. Good range. Can break up if there are a lot of walls, and obstuctions.
customer_reviews.author: Emilio Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Too Tight and some Intermittant connectiveness
customer_reviews.text: For what seems to be no reason occasionally the sound cuts out. It is not the distance which is adequate, but if the volume is too low the transmitter turns off. I may need to return this item.
customer_reviews.author: ShapAmos

customer_reviews.title: TDK WIRELESS HEADPHONES
customer_reviews.text: The sound is reallyl good the only objection I have is the distance I can hear it is not that great. Second floor to the first floor I lose the sound it goes on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Easy and good sound
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Works great. Sound is clearer than with my TV sound normally. Only used for a few times so far, so don't know about durability.
customer_reviews.author: Packrat

customer_reviews.title: Very nice headset
customer_reviews.text: I love this headset. There is no hum or hiss that you find on a lot of cordless sets. Battery life is better than I expected. It would be nice if this came with a recharging system. Range is not as good as described, but it is adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Headphones great-oversea shipping charges
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are great and the boys really enjoy them. Annova is an oversea shipper and although I paid $60.00 for priority shipping to receive in time for Christmas, UPS is now billing me an additional $19.20 for customs and brokerage charges. If this is noted when purchasing, I did not see it.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy LaVarra

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set of headphones. Kleer technology is as clear as they say it is. I would recommend to anyone wanting wireless comfort and great clean sound.
customer_reviews.author: Dave K

customer_reviews.title: Defective Headphones - Reseller OK
customer_reviews.text: The headphones quit working after a short time, but the reseller refunded the money in a reasonable amount of time. I don't know if the headphones were poorly designed or it was just the one that I ordered was defective.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Lee

customer_reviews.title: Transmitter is egg-like fragile
customer_reviews.text: The grade would be much higher had not the transmitter quit working after 90 days. It is flimsy and becomes damaged after a small bump. Otherwise it works well. I have had no luck in getting the company to replace the transmitter.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If I told you all how much money I have wasted on wireless headphones searching for these, it would be embarrassing. I have a very busy wife and daughter who are reading, doing homework, sleeping etc.....which necessitates that I have wireless headphones for tv viewing. I tried Sony and some other Best Buy crap.....they were terrible, I tried wired, inconvenient..... This product is what I have been looking for. They sound great and dont have the static, background interference, and other problems the other products have. Excellent.
customer_reviews.author: steve willis

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the headphones, but would not buy wireless again.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia C.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound! Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel of the headphones and their ease of use! Perfect for listening to music, the tv, or chord free metal detecting.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Nocher

customer_reviews.title: TDK WR700 Wireless Headphones - good performance, great value
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. The design is a little clunky so stopped me giving it 5, but functionally it is excellent
customer_reviews.author: D H.

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers I have been through multiple IR headphones. Short of blue tooth these are the best. Highly recommended and worth the price. Only minor complaint is having to change batteries in both the headphones and the base emitter.
customer_reviews.author: REELDOC

customer_reviews.title: good quality! I didn't realize they needed a receiver ...
customer_reviews.text: good quality! I didn't realize they needed a receiver which goes in to the head phone jack, I hoped they worked via blue tooth.
customer_reviews.author: David and Fatima

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth headphones are much better
customer_reviews.text: You have to be in direct vision with sender or you lose the connection. Bluetooth headphones have a much better quality sound and gives you moving flexibility. You also have the change a lot of AAA batteries. Get a rechargeable Bluetooth headphone instead.
customer_reviews.author: Bazaza Afandi

customer_reviews.title: Just disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my hubby, along with a Sony rugged construction site boom box for his work. He is a truck mechanic so he is in the shop all day and he can't stand the cow-pie music the other people play, lol. Well, he basically can't get more than 15 feet away, or even be on the other side of a truck (or under one) 5 to 10 feet away without it phasing in and out or losing the signal completely. For us it was a big waste of money. It's a shame, I had such high hopes.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: No static at all
customer_reviews.text: Using technology not readily avail in U S, these wireless headphones give you crystal clear reception no matter where you're connecting. See the manufacturer website for all the thrilling specs. My wife snores like a congested gorilla so I use these primarily in the bedroom to watch TV on one of the 364 nights a year she has a "headache". Didn't give them top rating as comfort design isn't perfect. After an hr or so, they become sweat boxes around your ears.
customer_reviews.author: Steely Dan

customer_reviews.title: TDK wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. I am a letter carrier and spend a lot of soitary time delivering mail. These headphones are wireless which is a big plus especially in winter when you have all these extra layers of clothing. Also, carrying a satchel and bundles of mail mean wires are constantly getting caught and pulled out os your ears or the socket. The sound is very good, no static, and the headphones actually help to keep my ears warm. Would recomend this product to anyone and everyone.
customer_reviews.author: cathy beards

customer_reviews.title: I bought mine for a $100 and they're wonderful. I can never go back to wires since ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine for a $100 and they're wonderful. I can never go back to wires since these are just as good. I wish the transmitter would stay on a little longer is all.
customer_reviews.author: Steven S

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars91 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
